front.title: YANG Data Model for Virtual Network Interfaces Management

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for the management of VNIs (Virtual Network Interfaces), including vNIC and CNI, depending on the different ways of virtualization. It exposes the real-time VNI resources to network controller and service orchestrator in order to supervise the cloud resource states for dynamic adjustment of service function placement and load-balancing of service instances to ensure the SLO (Service Level Objective).
